350: Company Description Eataly is the world’s largest artisanal Italian food and beverage marketplace! Eataly is not a chain; each Eataly is different, with its own character and own theme – but all with the same aim... for our guests to: EAT authentic Italian food at our restaurants, cafés and to-go counters SHOP a selection of high-quality Italian, local and homemade products LEARN through our classes and our team’s product knowledge Job Description A Graphic Design Associate assists with the creation and production of engaging visual content, both print and digital, to support all functions of the store’s business. This position is based onsite in the store. It is not a remote position. Reports to the Graphic Design Manager. Creates content including posters, product signs, price tags, demonstration signs, table cards, menus and flyers for restaurants, in-store events, retail displays and promotions Updates and maintains menus as needed by Eataly restaurants Assists in creating graphics for website and weekly email newsletters Generates and retouches photos - including food, space and portrait photography Works collaboratively at a fast pace Fulfills all incoming retail requests and production tasks according to urgency Adheres to Eataly’s brand, visual and style guidelines Performs other duties as required or assigned Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree in Communication Design, Graphic Design and/or Art preferred 1+ year of design experience, preferably in the food or retail industry Knowledge of print layout, typography and print production Creative eye and exceptional attention to detail Positive attitude, patience and willingness to be flexible and readjust priorities as needed Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Office and Adobe Illustrator, InDesign, Photoshop and Acrobat Digital photography skills with the ability to operate DSLR camera preferred Knowledge of Italian language preferred Job Requirements Availability to work onsite at the store with a flexible schedule, including Saturdays Additional Information Benefits and Perks Medical, Dental, Vision Insurance Paid Time Off Paid Parental Leave 401K with match or RRSP Bonus program Free family meal daily Discounts at Eataly Classes on products and Italian cuisine Referral bonus program and more!
